Summary: Took photos of chemtrails & a cigar shape appeared in a close-up.
divs: sighting detailsi was upset we were being sprayed again & so decided to take some pics of them to see the deference thickness as a comparison to the beautiful feathery white clouds & than loaded it on the iphoto to see it up close , lol ! in one zoomed in photo a 'rod \ cigar' shape can be seen , perhaps they check the chemical compositions being used ? the full original pic is nothing much to look at but i'm attaching anyway along with the close up of that craft .
